nodes.text: Maintenance crawlway B43 was located on the Ithorian Herdship Song of the Clouds. It was used by the thieves Hass Sonax and Dawson to access a secure lockbox containing a Gun of Command during a heist. While in the crawlway, Sonax used her Borg Construct Aj^6 to disable containment field 776 surrounding the lockbox, while Dawson used a fusioncutter to cut through the wall of the crawlway into the lockbox.
